fragment.p: An XML element is represented by a box labeled with a single tag, as shown in the first diagram in the figure. The description inside the box, if any, indicates what the element may contain. A group of elements that work together is represented by a three-dimensional block, as shown in the second diagram in the figure. Follow links a diagram's description to find a detailed description of a group.
A number range indicates the multiplicity of an element or a group.

fig.title: How to read a structure diagram
